content: विस्रंसन {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Causing to fall or drop drown; अंतर्मोहनमौलिघूर्णनचलन्मंदारवि स्रंसनः <ls>Gīt. 3.</ls> {@--2@} Untying, loosening; नीविविस्रंसनः करः <ls>K. P. 7.</ls> --नं {@--1@} Falling down. {@--2@} Flowing, dropping. {@--3@} Untying, loosening. {@--4@} A laxative, purgative.
